name: PepperM1nt-Pong
description:
Meet PepperM1nt-Pong, PepperM1nt-Mocha Studios first game! We love to get our heads together, create a concept, then get to work! I hope that you enjoy this quick little Pong clone, and try some of our other games, coming soon!
